bibl.title: P. Clackson 45-46. A Mid-Eighth-Century Trilingual Tax Demand Related to the Monastery of Apa Apollo at Bawit; - Nikolaos GONIS, Appendix. P. Clackson 46.
bibl.note: P. Clackson 45 (= P. Cambr. UL Michaelidis Inv. 807 recto). Arabic-Coptic tax-demand-note, with an initial, fragmentary minute in Greek. December 753. - P. Clackson 46 (= P. Cambr. UL Michaelidis Inv. 807 verso). Tax receipt in Greek (poll-tax, perhaps in combination with something else?), 10 January 758?

bibl.title: Monastic Estates in Late Antique and Early Islamic Egypt. Ostraca, Papyri, and Essays in Memory of Sarah Clackson (P. Clackson)

bibl.seg: 141.13 / 141.4 / 141.8 P. Cambr. UL Michaelidis Inv. 807 recto = P. Clackson 45 141.4 P. Cambr. UL Michaelidis Inv. 807 verso = P. Clackson 46
SIJPESTEIJN Petra M. and Sarah CLACKSON, P. Clackson 45-46. A Mid-Eighth-Century Trilingual Tax Demand Related to the Monastery of Apa Apollo at Bawit; - Nikolaos GONIS, Appendix. P. Clackson 46.

Anne BOUD'HORS, James CLACKSON, Catherine LOUIS and Petra SIJPESTEIJN (Edited by), Monastic Estates in Late Antique and Early Islamic Egypt. Ostraca, Papyri, and Essays in Memory of Sarah Clackson (P. Clackson) = American Studies in Papyrology. 46 (Cincinnati, Ohio, 2009) pp. 102-121 et pll. XIX-XX.

P. Clackson 45 (= P. Cambr. UL Michaelidis Inv. 807 recto). Arabic-Coptic tax-demand-note, with an initial, fragmentary minute in Greek. December 753. - P. Clackson 46 (= P. Cambr. UL Michaelidis Inv. 807 verso). Tax receipt in Greek (poll-tax, perhaps in combination with something else?), 10 January 758?
